lead_paragraph: France is unsettled by the arrests of four men, suspected of planning terrorist activities, who showed no sign of radicalization.

headline.print_headline: Terrorism Suspects Led Mainstream Lives, and That Leaves France Uneasy
headline.main: French Terrorism Suspects Appeared Anything But

snippet: France is unsettled by the arrests of four men, suspected of planning terrorist activities, who showed no sign of radicalization....
abstract: French authorities arrest Muslim man connected to so-called Strasbourg terrorist cell, bringing total number of men arrested to seven; arrests have unnerved nation, as suspects were all well-liked in their suburban neighborhoods, displaying no warning signs of radicalization.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
